Translations.Text: waqala nis'watun fi l-madinati im'ra-atu l-ʿazizi turawidu fataha ʿan nafsihi qad shaghafaha hubban inna lanaraha fi dalalin mubinin

falamma samiʿat bimakrihinna arsalat ilayhinna wa-aʿtadat lahunna muttaka-an waatat kulla wahidatin min'hunna sikkinan waqalati ukh'ruj ʿalayhinna falamma ra-aynahu akbarnahu waqattaʿna aydiyahunna waqul'na hasha lillahi ma hadha basharan in hadha illa malakun karimun
qalat fadhalikunna alladhi lum'tunnani fihi walaqad rawadttuhu ʿan nafsihi fa-is'taʿsama wala-in lam yafʿal ma amuruhu layus'jananna walayakunan mina l-saghirina
qala rabbi l-sij'nu ahabbu ilayya mimma yadʿunani ilayhi wa-illa tasrif ʿanni kaydahunna asbu ilayhinna wa-akun mina l-jahilina
fa-is'tajaba lahu rabbuhu fasarafa ʿanhu kaydahunna innahu huwa l-samiʿu l-ʿalimu
thumma bada lahum min baʿdi ma ra-awu l-ayati layasjununnahu hatta hinin

wadakhala maʿahu l-sij'na fatayani qala ahaduhuma inni arani aʿsiru khamran waqala l-akharu inni arani ahmilu fawqa rasi khub'zan takulu l-tayru min'hu nabbi'na bitawilihi inna naraka mina l-muh'sinina
qala la yatikuma taʿamun tur'zaqanihi illa nabbatukuma bitawilihi qabla an yatiyakuma dhalikuma mimma ʿallamani rabbi inni taraktu millata qawmin la yu'minuna bil-lahi wahum bil-akhirati hum kafiruna
wa-ittabaʿtu millata abai ib'rahima wa-is'haqa wayaʿquba ma kana lana an nush'rika bil-lahi min shayin dhalika min fadli l-lahi ʿalayna waʿala l-nasi walakinna akthara l-nasi la yashkuruna
yasahibayi l-sij'ni a-arbabun mutafarriquna khayrun ami l-lahu l-wahidu l-qaharu

ma taʿbuduna min dunihi illa asmaan sammaytumuha antum waabaukum ma anzala l-lahu biha min sul'tanin ini l-huk'mu illa lillahi amara alla taʿbudu illa iyyahu dhalika l-dinu l-qayimu walakinna akthara l-nasi la yaʿlamuna
yasahibayi l-sij'ni amma ahadukuma fayasqi rabbahu khamran wa-amma l-akharu fayus'labu fatakulu l-tayru min rasihi qudiya l-amru alladhi fihi tastaftiyani
waqala lilladhi zanna annahu najin min'huma udh'kur'ni ʿinda rabbika fa-ansahu l-shaytanu dhik'ra rabbihi falabitha fi l-sij'ni bid'ʿa sinina
waqala l-maliku inni ara sabʿa baqaratin simanin yakuluhunna sabʿun ʿijafun wasabʿa sunbulatin khud'rin wa-ukhara yabisatin yaayyuha l-mala-u aftuni fi ru'yaya in kuntum lilrru'ya taʿburuna
qalu adghathu ahlamin wama nahnu bitawili l-ahlami biʿalimina
waqala alladhi naja min'huma wa-iddakara baʿda ummatin ana unabbi-ukum bitawilihi fa-arsiluni
yusufu ayyuha l-sidiqu aftina fi sabʿi baqaratin simanin yakuluhunna sabʿun ʿijafun wasabʿi sunbulatin khud'rin wa-ukhara yabisatin laʿalli arjiʿu ila l-nasi laʿallahum yaʿlamuna
qala tazraʿuna sabʿa sinina da-aban fama hasadttum fadharuhu fi sunbulihi illa qalilan mimma takuluna
thumma yati min baʿdi dhalika sabʿun shidadun yakul'na ma qaddamtum lahunna illa qalilan mimma tuh'sinuna
thumma yati min baʿdi dhalika ʿamun fihi yughathu l-nasu wafihi yaʿsiruna
waqala l-maliku i'tuni bihi falamma jaahu l-rasulu qala ir'jiʿ ila rabbika fasalhu ma balu l-nis'wati allati qattaʿna aydiyahunna inna rabbi bikaydihinna ʿalimun

qala ma khatbukunna idh rawadttunna yusufa ʿan nafsihi qul'na hasha lillahi ma ʿalim'na ʿalayhi min suin qalati im'ra-atu l-ʿazizi l-ana hashasa l-haqu ana rawadttuhu ʿan nafsihi wa-innahu lamina l-sadiqina
dhalika liyaʿlama anni lam akhun'hu bil-ghaybi wa-anna l-laha la yahdi kayda l-khainina
